The world could experience a surge in population growth, as people who have passed away could return to life and contribute to society once again.

The resurrection of the dead could lead to a significant shift in the balance of power, as those who have died and returned could bring with them new knowledge and experiences that could change the course of history.
The resurrection of the dead could also lead to a greater understanding of the afterlife and what happens after death, as people who have returned could share their experiences with others.

The resurrection of the dead could also have a profound impact on the medical field, as doctors and scientists could study the bodies of the deceased to gain a better understanding of how to treat and prevent illnesses.
The resurrection of the dead could also lead to a greater appreciation for life, as people who have returned could share their experiences and remind others to cherish every moment they have.
